creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: small bat at top; moon with blue-grey ring around it and horizontal clouds in sky at bottom; long, large calligraphic inscription along right edge; three seals
inscription: Along right edge, in black: 求人不身由身由不求人(Those who seek are not free; those who are free do not seek)
markings: URC, in red: seal:　善身堂 below center, to left of inscription, in red: 長興之記;　鵬斎
signed: LRC, in black: 鵬斎老人書寫七十二{Bosai rojin shosha nanaju-ni}
title: Bat Flying Over the Moon
